metadata.title: CVE-2024-46703 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "serial: 8250_omap: Set the console genpd always on if no consolesuspend"This reverts commit 68e6939ea9ec3d6579eadeab16060339cdeaf940.Kevin reported that this causes a crash during suspend on platforms thatdont use PM domains.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
